BibliographicData.Title: Thalamic input to inferior area 6 and area 4 in the Macaque monkey

BrainSite.FullName: Nucleus ventralis anterior thalami, pars magnocellularis
Nucleus ventralis anterior thalami, pars parvocellularis
Nucleus ventralis lateralis thalami, pars caudalis
VLc-VPLo complex of the ventrolateral thalamus
Nucleus ventralis lateralis thalami, pars medialis
Nucleus ventralis lateralis thalami, pars oralis
Nucleus ventralis posterior lateralis thalami, pars oralis

TracerSubstance.FullName: Horseradish peroxidase, conjugated to wheat germ agglutinin

Reference.Quotation: "The results of monkey IT6-5 are presented in Figure 7. The most heavily labelled thalamic nucleus was area X. Dorsal to area X, the labelling extended into VLc, with a few labelled cells (not shown in the figure) also present ventrally in VLm and laterally in VPLo.Caudally, many marked neurons were observed at the junction between VLc and VPLo (VLc-VPLo complex). Outside the ventrolateral thalamus, labelled cells were present in the nuclei centralis lateralis (Cl), centrum medianum (Cn.Md), and medialis dorsalis (MD). Labelling in the last nucleus was rather intense and occupie its ventrolateral part. Finally, a few marked cells were found in the nucleus pulcinaris, pars oralis (Pul.o)."

Outside the ventrolateral thalamus, labelled cells were present in the nuclei centralis lateralis (Cl), centrum medianum (Cn.Md), and medialis dorsalis (MD). Labelling in the last nucleus was rather intense and occupie its ventrolateral part. Finally, a few marked cells were found in the nucleus pulcinaris, pars oralis (Pul.o)... Results similar to those shown in Figure 7 were obtained from monkeys IT6-8 and IT6-7. In this last animal (monkey IT6-7, Fig. 8), some labelled cells also were found in VApc and VLo."

"In this monkey [IT4-2], the injection was made in the rostral part of F1... In addition to VLo, labelling was found in VLm, in VPLo, and caudally in the VLc-VPLo complex.
